title: Battlefield pilot
creator_credit: Australia. Dept. of Defence and Vincent Donovan
brief_description: Australian Army pilots are among the best low level fliers in the world. The film demonstrates their skill by observing in depth a low level training flight by an Army pilot in a Pilatus Porter aircraft.
creator_credit_for_label: Australia. Dept. of Defence and Vincent Donovan
